explanation: [0-0] A German Shepherd lies on a floral-tiled floor against the wall of a room. To the left of the dog is a brown cabinet, and a person's shadow is cast on the dark wall. The room is dimly lit, with only a small area where the dog lies illuminated. At this point, the white English text "@Shortest Blockbusters" is marked on the right side of the screen.
[0-2] As the shot changes, the shadow of the person on the wall moves its hands, changing its posture.
